
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52715602">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 lzctuhao 于 2025-4-11 02:07 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font size="3">很多地方的公交集团都和“车来了”实时公交有合约，地方公交的APP（例如，“我的长沙”APP）都嵌入了“车来了”合约的无广告实时公交页面。一般来说，只能打开APP来查看实时公交，但把嵌入页面的URL提取出来，就能直接在浏览器里打开无广告页面啦！</font><br>
<font size="3"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="3">浏览器打开时，需要授权浏览器和网页<strong>定位权限</strong>以获取周边公交站！</font><br>
<img id="aimg_fizwQ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="240" height="102" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/11/67f803b08f1c7.jpg" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/04/11/67f803b08f1c7.jpg"><br>
<br>
<font size="3">以下是网页截图：</font><br>
<img id="aimg_BRA4T" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="360" height="800" file="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/03/25/67e2bde790a01.jpg" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.picui.cn/free/2025/03/25/67e2bde790a01.jpg"><br>
<br>
<font size="3">以下是我整理的一些合约页（无广告）：</font><br>
<br>
<font size="3"><br>
</font><div class="parsedown-markdown"><font size="3"></font><p><font size="3">【签约城市快捷入口】<br>

· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=webapp_weixin_chongqing&amp;utm_source=webapp_qqwallet&amp;hideFooter=1&amp;showFav=1&amp;showTopLogo=0&amp;supportSubway=1#!/linearound" target="_blank">重庆</a><br>

· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?src=webapp_dongguan#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔广东〕东莞</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?1=1&amp;src=wechat_chaozhouyueyun#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔广东〕潮州</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/sgyyh5/?from=singlemessage&amp;isappinstalled=0#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔广东〕韶关</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?src=wechat_yulingongjiao#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔广西〕玉林</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=app_fenghuazhangshang" target="_blank">〔浙江〕宁波奉化</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=wechat_zhoushan" target="_blank">〔浙江〕舟山</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=webapp_jiaxingbus#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔浙江〕嘉兴</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/pc_new/?src=pc_shiyan&amp;hideCity=0&amp;switchCity=0&amp;showTopLogo=0#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔湖北〕十堰</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=webapp_ganzhoutraffic" target="_blank">〔江西〕赣州</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?src=webapp_sanyatraffic#!/switchcity" target="_blank">〔海南〕三亚、万宁、陵水、临高</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?src=wechat_rushangongjiao&amp;showFav=1&amp;showTopLogo=0#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔山东〕乳山</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/?src=webapp_qqwallet&amp;hideFooter=1&amp;showFav=1&amp;homePage=around&amp;showTopLogo=0&amp;supportSubway=1&amp;cityId=047#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔福建〕福州</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://zq.chelaile.net.cn/customer_ch5/?src=wechat_yibin#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔四川〕宜宾</a><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=wechat_jinchenggonggongjiaotong" target="_blank">〔山西〕晋城</a></font><br>
<font size="3">· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/wwd/index?src=wechat_yinchuangongjiao" target="_blank">〔宁夏〕银川</a></font><font size="3">（25/4/11更新）</font><font size="3"><br>
· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=wechat_daqingjiaotou&amp;utm_source=wechat_daqingjiaotou&amp;showMap=1&amp;showTopLogo=0&amp;hideTimeTable=1&amp;autoRefreshTime=15000&amp;utm_medium=entrance#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔黑龙江〕大庆</a>（25/4/6更新）</font><br>
<font size="3">· <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://web.chelaile.net.cn/ch5/index.html?src=wechat_shiqiangongjiao&amp;showHeader=1&amp;hideFooter=1&amp;showWxmpFooter=0&amp;hideCity=0&amp;switchCity=0&amp;showAllCity=0&amp;showFav=0&amp;showLineReview=0&amp;noCheckCity=1&amp;utm_source=wechat_shiqiangongjiao&amp;utm_medium=entrance&amp;src=wechat_shiqiangongjiao#!/linearound" target="_blank">〔贵州〕石阡</a>（25/4/6更新）</font></p><font size="3">
</font><p><font size="3"></font><br>
<font size="3"><strong>【注】：</strong></font><br>
<font size="3">1. 博主已列出所有城市，未列出的城市暂时没有URL。</font><br>
<font size="3">2. <strong>广州</strong>乘客请直接在微信搜索“行讯通”小程序；<strong>上海</strong>乘客请</font><font size="3">直接在微信搜索“上海公交实时到站”，并进入“随申办→公交实时到站查询”。</font><font size="3">这是官方开发的实时公交小程序，也是无广告的。</font><br>
<font size="3"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="3">---</font><br>
<font size="3"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="3"><strong>你也可以贡献</strong>：</font><br>
<font size="3">- 如果你有其它城市的url地址，你可以直接回复URL；</font><br>
<font size="3">- 如果你知道，可以在某个地方公交的APP查看实时公交，但不知道如何提取URL，你可以回复这个APP的名称，谢谢。</font></p></div><font size="3">
<div class="parsedown-markdown-end_FLAG_ZXSQ" style="display:none"></div></font><br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
